caption:
“Silence is the speech of eternity.”

Reflection:
Words fade where truth is too vast to name. Silence holds what language cannot — the eternal echo of God.

Commentary:
This reflection reminds us that silence is not empty but divine. Eternity speaks quietly, and listening becomes the purest act of worship.
